languages.text: "Деваться мне все равно некуда... давайте же выясним, что за ересь грозит моей вотчине".
"I could not ignore this if I wanted to... so let us find out what heresy is threatening my domain."
languages.original_text: "Деваться мне все равно некуда... давайте же выясним, что за ересь грозит моей вотчине".

traits.locale_text: "I could not run away from this if I wanted to... so let us find out what heresy is threatening my domain."
"I could not run away from this if I wanted to... so let us find out what heresy is threatening my domain."
"I could not run away from this if I wanted to... so let us find out what heresy is threatening my domain."
"I could not run away from this if I wanted to... so let us find out what heresy is threatening my domain."
"I could not ignore this if I wanted to... so let us find out what heresy is threatening my domain."
"I could not ignore this if I wanted to... so let us find out what heresy is threatening my domain."

languages.text: "Ich könnte das nicht ignorieren, selbst wenn ich es wollte ... also lasst uns herausfinden, welche Ketzerei mein Reich bedroht."
languages.original_text: "I could not ignore this if I wanted to... so let us find out what heresy is threatening my domain."

traits.locale_text: "Ich könnte das nicht ignorieren, selbst wenn ich es wollte ... also lasst uns herausfinden, welche Ketzerei mein Reich bedroht."

languages.text: « Malgré moi, je ne peux pas l'ignorer... Découvrons quelle hérésie menace mon domaine. »
languages.original_text: "I could not ignore this if I wanted to... so let us find out what heresy is threatening my domain."

traits.locale_text: « Malgré moi, je ne peux pas l'ignorer... Découvrons quelle hérésie menace mon domaine. »

languages.text: “这种事情恐怕不能放任不管……好吧，让我看看，到底是什么异端恶行在威胁我的王朝。”
languages.original_text: "I could not ignore this if I wanted to... so let us find out what heresy is threatening my domain."

traits.locale_text: “这种事情恐怕不能放任不管……好吧，让我看看，到底是什么异端恶行在威胁我的王朝。”
“像这种事情，就算是想逃也逃不掉……好吧，让我看看，到底是什么异端恶行在威胁我的王朝。”

languages.text: «No podría ignorar este asunto aunque quisiera... Veamos qué herejía amenaza a mis dominios».
languages.original_text: "I could not ignore this if I wanted to... so let us find out what heresy is threatening my domain."

traits.locale_text: «No podría ignorar este asunto aunque quisiera... Veamos qué herejía amenaza a mis dominios».

languages.text: 「無視したくても、これは見過ごせない…ならば、自分の領地を脅かしている異端が何なのかを突き止めよう」
languages.original_text: "I could not ignore this if I wanted to... so let us find out what heresy is threatening my domain."

traits.locale_text: 「無視したくても、これは見過ごせない…ならば、自分の領地を脅かしている異端が何なのかを突き止めよう」

languages.text: "İstesem de bunu göz ardı edemezdim. Bakalım ne tür bir kâfirlik, topraklarımı tehdit ediyor."
languages.original_text: "I could not ignore this if I wanted to... so let us find out what heresy is threatening my domain."

traits.locale_text: "İstesem de bunu göz ardı edemezdim. Bakalım ne tür bir kâfirlik topraklarımı tehdit ediyor."
